data.title: The Motorstorm Franchise on PlayStation
data.meta_description: The Motorstorm Franchise consists of 3 games containing 178 trophies worth a total of 6,330 Trophy XP. View your total score for the franchise here
data.text:
Sony aims to launch 10 live-service games by 2026, including new Bungie IP

Sony's investor calls always yield interesting information for PlayStation fans. The most recent has revealed that PlayStation has ten live service games in development — that could be multiplatform — alongside a new Bungie IP.

Posted 2 years ago by Kes Eylers-Stephenson

PlayStation Now Adds 25 PS3 Games

PlayStation Now, the streaming service that brings games to a variety of devices, has added 25 more titles to its roster, bringing the total number of available games to over 9,00... sorry, over 450.

Posted 8 years ago by Brandon Fusco

NA PS Now Update - June 2016

Sony has updated the PS Now games list for North America with 50 new additions

Posted 8 years ago by MunchMagic1986
